algorithms.imageProcessing

Class BlobsAndContours

  • java.lang.Object
    • algorithms.imageProcessing.BlobsAndContours

  • public class BlobsAndContours
extends java.lang.Object
    holds the blobs, their ordered perimeters, and the scale space image contours of the perimeters
    Author:
    nichole

        type -
        segmentedToLineDrawing - true if image contains mostly white pixels and black lines for object contours (this is the result of segmentation using adaptive mean thresholding, for example)
